attributes.action: Respond to the persecution of LBGT people in Chechnya's "concentration camps"
attributes.background: Over the last few days it has been widely reported that there are "cocentration camps" persecuting, injuring, potentially killing LBGT people in Chechnya. Despite the growing amount of evidence & international news coverage this gov made no reference of these serious & troubling reports at G7 summit

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You might like to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/194915
